articles.title: Deadly Minneapolis School Shooting
articles.description: A shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic school during morning mass has left two children dead and 18 injured. The investigation is ongoing, with police reviewing surveillance footage and witness accounts. The father of one of the child victims spoke out about his loss.

articles.title: Trump's Global Tariffs Ruled Illegal by Appeals Court
articles.description: A federal appeals court has ruled that most of President Trump's global tariffs are illegal, finding he exceeded his authority. However, the court has allowed the tariffs to remain in place for now.

articles.title: "Trump Is Dead" Trends on X After JD Vance's Remarks Fuel Health Speculation
articles.description: The phrase "Trump is dead" trended on social media platform X, fueled by remarks from Vice President JD Vance and a resurfaced clip from The Simpsons. While White House officials state President Trump is in excellent health, the trend highlights public speculation about his well-being.
